extends LockableTileEntity, Inventory

      • isValidEffect

        boolean isValidEffect(PotionEffectType effect)
        Checks through the list of supported potions to see if the input effect is one of them.
        Parameters:
        effect - the PotionEffectType to check
        Returns:
        true if valid; false if not

      • isValidEffectAtLevels

                              int levels)
        Checks through the list of supported potions up to the specified level
        Parameters:
        effect - the PotionEffectType to check
        levels - the max level
        Returns:
        true if valid; false if not
